com.solace.aaron.geo.api

Class RadixStringFormatter.Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solace.aaron.geo.api.RadixStringFormatter.Helper
  • Enclosing class:
    RadixStringFormatter

    public static class RadixStringFormatter.Helper
extends java.lang.Object

    Helper class when formating these radix strings... there's a lot of parameters, and 3 ints in a row, so this makes it easier.

    Default values:

    • val = 0
    • radix = 10
    • padding = 1
    • factor = 0
    • paddingForNegs = true
